## Type of Change

<!--
Please check the box that best describes the nature of your change.
-->

-   [ ] ğŸ› **Bug Fix**: A change that fixes an issue.
-   [ ] âœ¨ **New Feature**: A change that adds new functionality.
-   [ ] â™»ï¸ **Refactor**: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature.
-   [ ] ğŸ“š **Documentation**: Changes to the documentation only.
-   [ ] âš™ï¸ **CI/CD**: Changes to our CI/CD configuration and scripts.
-   [ ] ğŸ”¨ **Build**: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies.
-   [ ] ğŸ¨ **Style**: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, etc.).
-   [ ] âª **Revert**: Reverts a previous commit.

## Checklist

<!--
Go over all the following points, and put an `x` in all the boxes that apply.
-->

-   [ ] My changes follows the [Contribution Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md).
-   [ ] I have updated `CHANGELOG.md` under the `[NextRelease]` section.
-   [ ] New unit tests have been added to cover the changes.
-   [ ] Manual testing has been performed to verify the changes.
